keel.Algorithms.Decision_Trees.PUBLIC

Class myDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Decision_Trees.PUBLIC.myDataset

  • public class myDataset
extends java.lang.Object
    File: myDataset.java This class contains the most useful information about a dataset, and provides a set of functions to manage this information easily.
    Since:
    JDK1.6
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Written by Victoria Lopez Morales (University of Granada) 15/05/2009

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      myDataset(myDataset dataset)
      Creates a dataset from another existing dataset
      myDataset(java.lang.String nameFile, int newkind)
      Creates a dataset by reading the .dat file that contains the information of it, and gives values to every field of the class

    • Constructor Detail

      • myDataset

        public myDataset(java.lang.String nameFile,
                 int newkind)
          throws CheckException
        Creates a dataset by reading the .dat file that contains the information of it, and gives values to every field of the class
        Parameters:
        nameFile - The name of the file that is going to be read
        newkind - The kind of dataset to determine if the file is for training, reference or test
        Throws:
        CheckException - Thrown from the CheckException class

      • myDataset

        public myDataset(myDataset dataset)
        Creates a dataset from another existing dataset
        Parameters:
        dataset - Original dataset from which we are going to create a copy
